name: rif-marketplace-meta
description: meta repository for convenient and fast local development of the rif marketplace

scripts.contracts:deploy:rns: cd rns-dev && npx truffle migrate --network ganache && cd ..
scripts.contracts:redeploy:rns: cd rns-dev && npx truffle migrate --network ganache --reset && cd ..
scripts.contracts:deploy:storage: cd storage-dev && npx truffle migrate --network ganache && cd ..
scripts.contracts:redeploy:storage: cd storage-dev && npx truffle migrate --network ganache --reset && cd ..
scripts.contracts:deploy:notifier: cd notifier-dev && npx truffle migrate --network ganache && cd ..
scripts.contracts:redeploy:notifier: cd notifier-dev && npx truffle migrate --network ganache --reset && cd ..
scripts.contracts:config: npm run ganache-cli:pm2 && npm run contracts:deploy && npm run contracts:create-config
scripts.upload-service:config: cd upload-service && npm run bin -- db-migration --up && cd ..
scripts.upload-service:start:pm2: cd upload-service && NODE_ENV=development pm2 start npm --name=upload-service -- run bin start -- --log=debug && cd ..
scripts.upload-service:start: cd upload-service && NODE_ENV=development npm run bin start -- --log=debug && cd ..
scripts.upload-service: npm run upload-service:create-db && npm run upload-service:start
scripts.pinner:config: cd pinner && npm run init && npm run bin -- init --offerId 0x90F8bf6A479f320ead074411a4B0e7944Ea8c9C1 --db=./db.sqlite && cd ..
scripts.pinner:ipfs:consumer: cd pinner && npm run ipfs:consumer daemon && cd ..
scripts.pinner:ipfs:provider: cd pinner && npm run ipfs:provider daemon && cd ..
scripts.pinner:ipfs:provider:pm2: cd pinner && pm2 start npm --name=ipfs-provider -- run ipfs:provider -- daemon && cd ..
scripts.pinner:ipfs:consumer:pm2: cd pinner && pm2 start npm --name=ipfs-consumer -- run ipfs:consumer -- daemon && cd ..
scripts.pinner:start:pm2: cd pinner && NODE_ENV=ganache pm2 start npm --name=pinner -- run bin daemon -- --log=debug --db=./db.sqlite && cd ..
scripts.pinner:start: cd pinner && NODE_ENV=ganache npm run bin daemon -- --log=debug --db=./db.sqlite && cd ..
scripts.pinner: npm run pinner:init && npm run pinner:start
scripts.cache:create-db: cd cache && npm run bin -- db-migration --up && cd ..
scripts.cache:precache: cd cache && NODE_ENV=ganache npm run bin precache all && cd ..
scripts.cache:config: npm run cache:create-db && npm run cache:precache
scripts.cache:start:pm2: cd cache && NODE_ENV=ganache pm2 start npm --name=cache -- run bin -- start --enable rns storage notifier --log=debug && cd ..
scripts.cache:start: cd cache && NODE_ENV=ganache npm run bin -- start --enable rns storage notifier --log=debug && cd ..
scripts.cache: npm run cache:config && npm run cache:start
scripts.rns-manager:start:pm2: cd rns-manager && REACT_APP_URL=http://localhost:3001/ pm2 start npm --name=rns-manager -- start && cd ..
scripts.rns-manager: cd rns-manager && REACT_APP_URL=http://localhost:3001/ npm start && cd ..
scripts.dapp:start:pm2: cd dapp && REACT_APP_NETWORK=ganache pm2 start npm --name=dapp -- start && cd ..
scripts.mkp:config: npm run contracts:config && npm run cache:config
scripts.all:config: npm run contracts:config && npm run upload-service:config && npm run pinner:config && npm run cache:config
scripts.mkp:start:pm2: npm run cache:start:pm2 && npm run dapp:pm2
scripts.all:start:pm2: npm run cache:start:pm2 && npm run pinner:ipfs:provider:pm2 && npm run pinner:ipfs:consumer:pm2 && npm run pinner:start:pm2 && npm run upload-service:start:pm2 && npm run rns-manager:start:pm2 && npm run dapp:start:pm2
scripts.mkp: npm run mkp:install && npm run mkp:config && npm run mkp:start:pm2
scripts.all: npm run all:install && npm run all:config && npm run all:start:pm2

author: Artem Brazhnikov
